def maximize_array_value(n, a):
    not_mask = (1 << 32) + 1
    a_not = tuple([not_mask ^ i for i in a])
    dp_left = [0] * n
    dp_right = [0] * n
    dp_left[0] = a_not[0]
    dp_right[-1] = a_not[-1]
    for ind in range(1, n):
        dp_left[ind] = dp_left[ind - 1] & a_not[ind]
    for ind in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
        dp_right[ind] = dp_right[ind + 1] & a_not[ind]
    max_ind = -1
    max_val = -1
    for ind in range(n):
        left = not_mask if ind == 0 else dp_left[ind - 1]
        right = not_mask if ind == n - 1 else dp_right[ind + 1]
        tmp = left & a[ind] & right
        if tmp > max_val:
            max_val = tmp
            max_ind = ind
    a.insert(0, a.pop(max_ind))
    return a
